name: .MINDER File Extension
summary: Learn about .MINDER files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open MINDER files with Minder on a Linux system.
You can also open MINDER files with an XML editor, since they store information in the XML standard. However, MINDER files opened with an XML editor will not look the same as being opened in Minder.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
